column1: Little Goat Diner////After an hour wait drinking beer in the "cafe" section and snacking on cubes of delicious bread
column2: we were sat at the counter. I am not sure if they are shooting for a hipster irony or are truly trying to recreate an American diner experience
column3: either way the feel of the room and the flow of the room fail miserably.  The room is deafening by design
column4: silly if you ask me.  There is something to be said of the energy of a room
column5: but when a designer does everything they can to force noise into your space it just gets annoying.
